Hmm, in Fortran, reading from standard input is a bit different. Since Fortran typically reads from files, but I can use unit=5 which is standard input. But how do I read lines until end of file?

The Java code first splits the first line into parts using split(" "), so it's splitting on any whitespace. In Fortran, the read * will read free-format, which also ignores whitespace, so it's equivalent. So the code should work.
